name: Verify Hallway Lighting Sequence on Region 1 Entry
description: Validates that upon entering region 1, the hallway lights activate incrementally from the opposite side.
testObjective: Ensure the hallway lighting sequence provides visual feedback for region 1 entry.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Interact with the door button to open the hallway door

steps.expected: Lights begin activating from the opposite side of the hallway
Lights turn on incrementally in sequence, not all at once

postconditions: All hallway lights are fully activated
Hallway is properly illuminated for navigation
